content.question: Let <math> <mi>θ</mi> </math> be the angle shown in the figure. Find the rate of change of <math> <mi>θ</mi> </math>, radians per hour, when x = 4 km and y = 3 km.

frqParts.text: Let <math> <mi>θ</mi> </math> be the angle shown in the figure. Find the rate of change of <math> <mi>θ</mi> </math>, radians per hour, when x = 4 km and y = 3 km.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
